article_node.title: Dan Wang on China's Breakneck Economic Growth
article_node.summary: Odd Lots podcast episode features Dan Wang, a Stanford Hoover History Lab research fellow, discussing China's rapid technological and economic growth, its trajectory toward socialism, and evolving perceptions, while exploring lessons for America. The episode is part of Bloomberg's Odd Lots series, hosted by Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, and is available on Apple Podcasts and Spotify.
